data.description:
Snipers are so skilled at setting ambushes that they have an uncanny ability to detect them as well.

A Sniper character that is actively searching for possible ambushes has a 1 in 3 chance of detecting them (1 in 6 chance if looking for another Sniper). At 3rd level, this chance increases to 2 in 3 (3 in 6 if looking for another Sniper). Other factors may modify this chance to spot an ambush, at the Referee’s discretion.

The Sniper cannot move faster than 1/2 his normal Movement rate while searching for ambushes.
